task.title: Create a volume access group for Fibre Channel clients
task.shortdesc: Volume access groups enable communication between Fibre Channel clients and volumes on a SolidFire storage system. Mapping Fibre Channel client initiators (WWPN) to the volumes in a volume access group enables secure data I/O between a Fibre Channel network and a SolidFire volume.

keywords.indexterm: volume access group for Fibre Channel clientscreating
Fibre Channel clientscreating a volume access group

context.p: You can also add iSCSI initiators to a volume access group; this gives the initiators access to the same volumes in the volume access group.

step.cmd: Enter a name for the volume access group in the Name field.
Select and add the Fibre Channel initiators from the Unbound Fibre Channel Initiators list.

info.note: You can add or delete initiators at a later time.

step.cmd: Select and add an iSCSI initiator from the Initiators list.
To attach volumes to the access group, perform the following steps:

substep.cmd: Select a volume from the Volumes list.
